document.full_text: yao ming has cast doubt on his return to the nba by admitting to the possibility he may not play again as he battles to recover from his latest injury, chinese media reported.
document.title: injury-riddled yao ming frets over future in game
lines_and_colors: yao ming has cast doubt on his return to the nba by admitting to the possibility he may not play again as he battles to recover from his latest injury, chinese media reported.
